website_summaries.verdict: Even if you're on a tight budget, you should skip Alcatel's One Touch Fierce in favor of a better prepaid phone.
pros: The Alcatel One Touch Fierce is inexpensive, has great call quality, and clocks in with respectable HSPA+ speeds
cons: The handset's internal speeds are sluggish
In addition, its camera has a unintuitive UI and takes poor photos

customer_reviews.title: OLD VERSION - DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is a previous generation and the phone description should be updated. There is a Fierce 2 that has been released. This is also a refurbished phone. It is not new as described.

I would be thankful if you check the model before sending it to customer. Thanks and regards.

customer_reviews.title: At first it looked like a locked phone - T-Mobile everything
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Since I got this thing last year, it just keeps getting worse. Out of storage problems, can't move to SD card, can't delete shovelware, and I can't root the damn thing either. It's very disconcerting when a product's performance deteriorates substantially over such a short period of time. At first it looked like a locked phone - T-Mobile everything. But when I finally got an AT&T SIM it seemed to work fine. Note that it takes only the smaller kind of SIM. Not the big ones.
customer_reviews.author: G Rowland

customer_reviews.title: A good basic smart phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a good basic smart phone. We had some problems with being able to use it with a Mexican SIM card when we first got it, but the customer service from the seller was superb, and they walked us through getting it to work (via many friendly emails). This isn't an iphone, but then again, I didn't want all of the bells and whistles that come with an iphone. It is functional and it works. That is what matters to me.
customer_reviews.author: jr

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is the 1st item I ordered from Amazon that I would not recommend and I have been purchasing items for 3 years. The phone did not work. Could not even read the screen. Returned the day after received.

customer_reviews.title: worst phone ever

I bought another one for my wife and the same problem happens. Signal, most of time is low. Alcatel is a very good brand, but this model I would not recomend.

product_meta.title: Alcatel One Touch Fierce 4G Android Smartphone Unlocked - Use With Any SIM - Slate
product_meta.description: This Fierce has been determined fully functional by our industry leading functionality inspection. It will show signs of wear like scratches, scuffs, and minor nicks on the screen or body. This item will NOT come in its original packaging NOR will it include original accessories, headsets, SIM card, or manual. It WILL include a certified 3rd party cable and UL approved power adapter. This Fierce is fully functional with T-Mobile, AT&T and all other GSM networks. It will NOT work on Sprint, Verizon, Boost, Virgin Mobile or any other CDMA network.
feature_bullets: 4.5 in qHD Display - a vivd screen for viewing photos, playing games and watchuing HD movies
Quad-Core Processor with 1GB RAM and 4 GB ROM & a Micro SD Slot for expandable memory
5 MB rear camera with LED flash and camcorder to capture, edit, create and share photos and videos in addition to a VGA front facing camera
Smooth multitasking experience allows you to simultaneously run multiple apps, games and access the internet

Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T and T-Mobile as well as with GSM SIM cards (e.g. H20, Straight Talk, and select prepaid carriers). Unlocked cell phones will not work with CDMA Carriers like Sprint, Verizon, Boost or Virgin.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars166 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
